attributes.additional_details:
Such an action can be considered an attempt to suspend parliamentary sovereignty and in effect a temporary suspension of Parliamentary Democracy in the United Kingdom.
 
I believe this is likely to have a grave impact on our constitution and should therefore be urgently considered by parliament.
attributes.background: Proposals have been put forward to close/ prorogue Parliament to prevent it from holding the government to account and expressing parliament’s will in relation to Brexit. Parliament should change the law to prevent this.
